txt.en: The food-supplies in Madh-fushaum are stored in sacks that are spread out throughout the camp. You should find them and destroy them.
The food-supplies in Madh-fushaum are stored in sacks that are spread out throughout the camp. You should find them and destroy them.
Destroying the food-stores of this large army will have a devastating effect on its health and morale, unless the leaders of the army can find a new supply soon.
The food-supplies in Madh-fushaum are stored in sacks that are spread out throughout the camp. You should find them and destroy them.
The food-supplies in Madh-fushaum are stored in sacks that are spread out throughout the camp. You should find them and destroy them.
The leaders of the army in Madh-fushaum will be hard-pressed to replace the food-stores that you destroyed, providing an adequate distraction, while they scramble to find a new supply.
This part of Madh-fushaum appears to have more food than the others
The army in Madh-fushaum brought a large stock of food with them from Isengard and keep it stored in sacks throughout the camp.
An army of this size requires a large stock of food. By destroying these stores, you could force them to find new stores, hindering their ability to attack.
